home.title: Quiz Exercises
home.createOrEditLabel: Create or edit a Quiz Exercise

quizExercise.created: A new Quiz Exercise is created with identifier {{ param }}
quizExercise.updated: A Quiz Exercise is updated with identifier {{ param }}
quizExercise.deleted: A Quiz Exercise is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Quiz Exercise {{ id }}?

edit.title: Edit Quiz Exercise for {{ param }}
edit.quizIsActive:
The quiz has started. No more changes allowed.

Retroactive corrections can be made, once the quiz has ended.

quizInstructions.default: Mark the correct answers for each question and click the "Submit" button, when you're done.
quizInstructions.wait: Please wait until the quiz has ended to see your results.
quizInstructions.result: You have finished the quiz with {{userScore}} out of {{maxScore}} points ({{percentage}} %).
quizInstructions.waitForStart:
Please wait.

This page will refresh automatically, when the quiz starts.

quizExercise.statisticsNotPublished: The instructor has not published any statistics.
quizExercise.successfullySubmittedText:
Your answers have been successfully submitted!

The results will appear when the quiz has ended.

warning.answer_correctness: Solution of an answer option changed:
warning.no_changes: No changes, which affect the existing results
warning.statistic: The existing statistics must be recalculated!
warning.results: The existing results must be recalculated!

resulttext.answer_deleted: The answer option will be removed from all results
resulttext.answer_invalid: All participants receive the points for the invalid answer
resulttext.question_deleted: The question will be removed from all results
resulttext.question_invalid: All participants receive the points for the invalid question
resulttext.scoring_change: The scores will be recalculated. A participant could also lose points

warning.confirmtext: Do you really want to perform these changes?

invalidReasons.quizDuration: Quiz: The duration is missing or invalid.
invalidReasons.noQuestion: Quiz: The quiz has no question.
invalidReasons.questionCorrectAnswerOption: Question {{index}}: No answer option is correct.
invalidReasons.questionUnsolvable: Question {{index}}: The question cannot be answered correctly without using a drag item twice.
invalidReasons.misleadingCorrectMapping: Question {{index}}: You have defined at least one correct mapping (or group of correct mappings), that when used, makes it impossible to answer the question correctly.
